programme.title: I'm in Love with a Church Girl
programme.desc: Miles Montego has it all - cars, boats, good looks, mansion, money, women, but more importantly, he has a past. Miles is a retired high-level drug trafficker who is now completely legitimate. Even though Miles has turned over a new leaf, the DEA can't seem to let him out of their sights. Miles' only downfall is that he is extremely loyal to his circle of friends and former colleagues who are not retired from the lucrative business. Struggling to keep on the right side of the law, Miles meets the girl of his dreams, but she's not the usual type of girl that he's used to dating. Vanessa is a church girl in every sense of the word. They are tested to their last ounce of faith and strength in God and each other. God continues to chip away at Miles through struggles from his past, having to live up to his reputation, feelings of unworthiness, the death of his mother, federal charges, his friends being indicted, the strain on his relationship with Vanessa, almost losing her in a near-fatal car accident, and finally the spiritual breakdown and one on one with God that brings Miles to his knees.

programme.title: Prodigal
programme.desc: A conflicted individual stuck in a dangerous city with their disabled sibling has to make a choice that could alter their lives forever.

programme.title: Kevin Hart: Standing Tall
programme.desc: Laughter is the best medicine. Just ask Kevin Hart. Comedy would rule as an antidote to a troubled childhood. Hartâ€™s work ethic has no limits, with 8 comedy specials, 54 films, 90 TV shows, and a world tour to date.

programme.title: Pushout: The Criminalization of Black Girls in Schools
programme.desc: Following a relative's mysterious death, a couple faces strange events and eerie neighbors in their inherited home.

programme.title: Shabu
programme.desc: Shabu, a 14-year-old artist from "The Paperclip," Rotterdam's tough hood, wrecks his grandma's car and must hustle to repay her by summer's end, using his music and wit to shine.

programme.title: Fire on the Hill: The Cowboys of South Central LA
programme.desc: A powerful documentary on three Black cowboys in LA finding hope, freedom, and purpose.

programme.title: Caroltyn
programme.desc: A young mother uncovers a demonic force behind a deadly virus haunting Caroltyn.

programme.title: Grow a Better Dallas
programme.desc: After being wrongfully incarcerated for 26 years, Tyrone Day returns to Dallas to tackle social injustice through urban agriculture.

programme.title: Just Like Your Daddy
programme.desc: Reunited by news of their father's illness, two preacher brothers fight against a dark conspiracy to destroy his legacy.

programme.title: No Shade
programme.desc: After experiencing colorism in several personal and professional encounters, Jade realises she has to embrace her inherent beauty to find a happy ever after.

programme.title: Clunkers
programme.desc: Ritchie's setback leads to an unexpected journey in the world of used car salesmanship.

programme.title: The Perfect Mate
programme.desc: When Hope's relationship crumbles, she seeks a Christian man to meet her family's expectations. Jesse steps up, but it's challenging.

programme.title: Brothers In Law
programme.desc: Former high school "frenemies" hilariously become unexpected law partners, sparking funny adventures in the legal world.

programme.title: Nine Divine
programme.desc: A shy foster girl escapes her painful life through art, but when her baby brother disappears, she must find him quickly while others begin to question her sanity.

programme.title: Expect the Unexpected
programme.desc: After years of hiding his deepest, darkest secrets, Jeff's world starts to fall apart when his past returns to haunt him.
